question: Consider the following statements about the Makaravilakku festival season 1.It is a biannual festival held on Makar Sankranti in Kerala, at the shrine of Sabarimala. 2.It is an 21 day long festival. Which one is true?
explanation: Makaravilakku is an annual festival held on Makar Sankranti in Kerala, at the shrine of Sabarimala. The festival includes the Thiruvabharanam (sacred ornaments of Ayyappan) procession.
